AssertionError.description: Raised when an assert statement fails.

AttributeError.description: Raised when attribute assignment or reference fails.

EOFError.description: Raised when the input() function hits end-of-file condition.

FloatingPointError.description: Raised when a floating point operation fails.

GeneratorExit.description: Raise when a generator's close() method is called.

ImportError.description: Raised when the imported module is not found.

IndexError.description: Raised when the index of a sequence is out of range.

KeyError.description: Raised when a key is not found in a dictionary.

KeyboardInterrupt.description: Raised when the user hits the interrupt key (Ctrl+C or Delete).

MemoryError.description: Raised when an operation runs out of memory.

NameError.description: Raised when a variable is not found in local or global scope.

OSError.description: Raised when system operation causes system related error.

OverflowError.description: Raised when the result of an arithmetic operation is too large to be represented.

ReferenceError.description: Raised when a weak reference proxy is used to access a garbage collected referent.

RuntimeError.description: Raised when an error does not fall under any other category.

StopIteration.description: Raised by next() function to indicate that there is no further item to be returned by iterator.

SyntaxError.description: Raised by parser when syntax error is encountered.

IndentationError.description: Raised when there is incorrect indentation.

TabError.description: Raised when indentation consists of inconsistent tabs and spaces.

SystemError.description: Raised when interpreter detects internal error.

TypeError.description: Raised when a function or operation is applied to an object of incorrect type.

UnboundLocalError.description: Raised when a reference is made to a local variable in a function or method, but no value has been bound to that variable.

UnicodeError.description: Raised when a Unicode-related encoding or decoding error occurs.

UnicodeEncodeError.description: Raised when a Unicode-related error occurs during encoding.

UnicodeDecodeError.description: Raised when a Unicode-related error occurs during decoding.

UnicodeTranslateError.description: Raised when a Unicode-related error occurs during translating.

ValueError.description: Raised when a function gets an argument of correct type but improper value.

ZeroDivisionError.description: Raised when the second operand of division or modulo operation is zero.

BaseException.description: The base class for all built-in exceptions

BufferError.description: Raised when a buffer related operation cannot be performed.

LookupError.description: Raised when a key or index used on a mapping or sequence is invalid

ModuleNotFoundError.description: Raised by import when a module could not be located. It is also raised when None is found in sys.modules.

RecursionError.description: Raised when the interpreter detects that the maximum recursion depth (see sys.getrecursionlimit()) is exceeded.

StopAsyncIteration.description: Must be raised by __anext__() method of an asynchronous iterator object to stop the iteration.
